text: Jade, 3 22-year-old female, presents to the GP with a rash that suddenly appeared on her abdomen and has now spread to her back and thighs. it is only mildly itchy. She was treated with antibiotics 2 weeks ago for acute tonsilitis. - On examination there are small red scaly papules present (see images) What is the most likely diagnosis? ® A. Drug reaction O B. Guttate psoriasis O €. Nummular dermatitis O D.Piyriasis lichenoides O E. Pityriasis rosea
